title: On a 13 game win streak, was going for gold, very last win in my promos to gold, the season resets?!
body:
On a 13 game win streak, was going for gold, very last win in my promos to gold, the season resets?!

I'm very curious if I can somehow get special privilege to have my gold boarder? I worked really hard for that gold before season reset, and literally I start my last game, and I win. I think I'm gold, then I notice the season got reset and only 1 win in my placement games. I somehow got so unlucky that the season literally reset while I was winning my last game to gold... That was the MOST disappointing thing ever.. Please Rito, hear my plea!!

I appreciate your time,
Brandon

(I also posted this in the bugs section because I had no idea where to post this. Sorry if that was not the place to do so)
